channel.title: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?
channel.description: I was just wondering if 3$ an update was worth slave bot when you could always use aryan. Other than the few extras like the human mouse controll with that little red dot (which is sexy) and the extras in the top right of your RS screen is there a reason to use this over Aryan? If this has already been asked could you just point to it, I havnt' been following anything rs related since kaitnieks went down.

item.title: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

aryan i made about 5m and 2 guildminer acounts… Slave bot got me banned at around 44 mining and didnt make a cent (didnt sell before i got banned). The aryan im talking about is mopar’s but now the randoms are becoming stuffy, UID’s?

Read full topic
item.source: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?

item.title: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I payed 12M for SBoT3 and made more than 20M off of it.

But I won’t buy it again.

And why buy SlaveBot? Everyone and their mother knows how to update aryan by now.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?

item.title: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?
item.dc:creator: @hdkilla HDKilla
item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

Look at this, I payed 15 mill for SBot 3, then I made under 1 mill and RichyT closes up shop leaving me out to dry.

I pay 15 bucks for 5 weeks of Slavebot and im making 15 mill a week, for a fraction of the cost.

I dont know why the hell I even bothered with SBot, I should have sold my 15 mill and invested that all into Slavebot.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?

item.source: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?

item.title: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Well,

For 600k i would say no because in the long run you can but sbot for cheaper so money wise no. RichyT i am willing to bet knows alot more then ruler since he has made his own bots many times, from scratch and doesnt just edit them. TBOT, SBOT, SBOT2, SBOT3. Even if SBOT3 has some of aryans code in it.

Slave Bot is 95% Aryans code. The other 5% is the mouse code and the gui they have added,

Another alterative is AryanRune. It has a mouse an amazing gfx disable means aryan uses little cpu and has a text scriptable engine aswell as aryans normal one. Cost wise its only 3mill forever :),and is now dont by dcthigs and drblunt. It was orginally by dcthugs but hes working on a new bot so aryanrune has nw been tken by drblunt who ithink made his own bot ages ago for runescape classic. I may be wrong.

Then you can use scar , free, dont by one of the best programmers in runescape cheating and the author of the well remembed AutoRune ( the original one where you could actually duplicate items). It is definatly the least detectble auto out but comes at the price that you can only have one running .

Read full topic
item.source: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?

item.source: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?

item.title: Is Imps slave bot any better than Aryan; worth 3m every update?
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

I’m not an IMPSoft hater at all, but I will say ‘no’. It’s not worth your cash. I suggest using SCAR to auto, as SCAR is free and I’m tired of seeing Aryan and its assorted evil spawn rule the RS Cheating scene.

Does anyone else really, really, REALLY miss the atmosphere of Kaitnieks before Aryan, when everyone either knew how to code for SCAR or was learning how to code? I havent’ seen much of that in a long time.

Read full topic

I would say no. I have heard that SB3 is better, but I do not think it is all that better than aryan (or Scar) to pay for it every update.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 09, 2006, 03:41:19 pm[/size][hr]Also, if you wanna test SB3, They are hosting a trial of it until the next update. Search for it, there is a thread here somewhere.
